radiographic_examinations.findings: Small left-sided simple pleural effusion, trace right-sided pleural effusion likely present, bibasilar atelectasis. No evidence of focal lesions in liver, pancreas, and spleen. Small focus of air within gallbladder and small focus of pneumobilia post ERCP. Gallbladder contains gallstones without wall thickening or surrounding inflammation. Significant fat stranding surrounding proximal and mid duodenum with small free fluid in the pelvis. Reactive lymph nodes in the mesentery.
